steps.name: Admin gives the correct LMS portal URL

elements.name: Validate login with null password

steps.name: Admin is in Home Page
Admin enter value only in username using "Login" and 3
clicks login button
Error message for null password " Please enter your password "
Admin gives the correct LMS portal URL

elements.name: Validate login with null username

steps.name: Admin is in Home Page
Admin enter value only in password using "Login" and 2
clicks login button
Error message for null username " Please enter your user name "
Admin gives the correct LMS portal URL

elements.name: Validate login with invalid credentials

Admin enter invalid credentials from "Login" and 1
clicks login button
Error message for "Invalid username and password Please try again"

arguments.val: "Invalid username and password Please try again"

steps.name: Admin gives the correct LMS portal URL

steps.name: Admin is in Home Page
Admin enter valid credentials from "Login" and 0
clicks login button
Admin should land on dashboard page

Admin clicks <A New Program> button

elements.name: Validate invalid values on the text column

elements.name: Validate Close(X) icon on Program Details form

elements.name: Validate Save button on Program Details form

steps.name: Admin is on "Program Details" Popup window
Enter all the required fields with valid values "Program" and 3
Admin clicks Save Button
Admin gets a message "Successful Program Created" alert and able to see the new program added in the data table

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Validate Cancel button on Program Details form

steps.name: Admin is on "Program Details" Popup window
Admin clicks <Cancel>button
Admin can see the Program details popup disappears without creating any program

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Validate Edit Feature

steps.name: Admin is on Manage Program Page
Admin should see the text as Showing x to y of z entries along with Pagination icon below the table
Admin should see the number of records displayed on the page are 5
Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row
Admin should see a popup open for Program details to edit

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Edit Program Name

steps.name: Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row
Admin edits the Name column using "Program" and 4
Admin clicks Save Button
Admin gets a message "Successful Program Updated" alert and able to see the updated name in the table for the particular program

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Edit Program description

steps.name: Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row
Admin edits the Description column in using "Program" and 5
Admin clicks Save Button
Admin gets a message "Successful Program Updated" alert and able to see the updated description in the table for the particular program

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Change Program Status

steps.name: Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row
Admin changes the Status
Admin clicks Save Button
Admin gets a message "Successful Program Updated" alert and able to see the updated status in the table for the particular program

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

steps.name: Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row
Admin clicks <Cancel>button on edit popup
Admin can see the Program details popup disappears and can see nothing changed for particular program

elements.name: Validate Save button on Edit popup

steps.name: Admin clicks <Edit> button on the data table for any row

Admin gets a message "Successful Program Updated" alert and able to see the updated details in the table for the particular program

elements.name: Validate Delete Feature

steps.name: Admin is on Manage Program Page
Admin clicks <Delete> button on the data table for any row
Admin should see a alert open with heading "Confirm" along with  <YES> and <NO> button for deletion

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Validate details for Confirm Deletion form

steps.name: Admin is on Manage Program Page
Admin clicks <Delete> button on the data table for any row
Admin should see a message "Are you sure you want to delete <Program name>?"

arguments.val: "Are you sure you want to delete <Program name>?"

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Click Yes on deletion window

steps.name: Admin is on Confirm Deletion alert
Admin clicks <YES> button on the alert
Admin gets a message "Successful Program Deleted" alert and able to see that program deleted in the data table

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Click No on deletion window

steps.name: Admin is on Confirm Deletion alert
Admin clicks <NO> button on the alert
Admin can see the deletion alert disappears without deleting

elements.name: Admin successfully logged in to LMS Portal

steps.name: Admin is on dashboard page after Login

elements.name: Validate Cancel/Close(X) icon on Confirm Deletion alert

steps.name: Admin is on Confirm Deletion alert
Admin clicks Close(X) Icon on Deletion alert
Admin can see the deletion alert disappears without any changes
